attributes.action: Make petitions illegal. I'm fed up of them.
attributes.additional_details: The evidence i'm submitting to support my petition is my Facebook newsfeed. I'll send over a screenshot to her majesty.
attributes.background: I'm fed up of seeing petitions started on social media. Whether it's the Royals paying for the palace renovation that they don't own (and have paid for about 10 times over) or a petition to stop someone entering our country because we don't like what they say. It annoys me. Make petitions illegal.

rejection.details:
The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for all petitions.

If you want the UK Government and Parliament to close this site, we could accept a petition calling for that.
